availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Joshua W. Winters (Hopkins County, Ky, farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County, Kentucky, farmer. Tennessee native. Married to Elizabeth C. Chandler Winters in Henderson County, Kentucky, on November 29, 1855. Father of Martha A. R. Winters. Resident in Hopkins County in 1859. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Hopkins County, KY, September 1863, p. 162.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994038, Henderson County Marriages.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll #994039, Hopkins County Births, p. 521.
